raw_response: {"answer_index": 2, "answer_text": "The K-ABC is a highly precise tool to evaluate the intellectual capacity of gifted children, allowing them to manipulate time and space to their advantage", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "This claim is the most absurd as it attributes supernatural abilities (manipulating time and space) to a cognitive assessment tool, which is impossible and contradicts all established scientific understanding.", "evidence_quality": "implausible"}
